EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for requesting, download now
EmailTemplate.name: WC-2018-05-Forrester-Wave-Q2-2018.Thank You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Cloud Optimization and Monitoring, Q2 2018 Report from Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for requesting the "Forrester WaveTM: Cloud Optimization and Monitoring, Q2 2018" report from Turbonomic. Click the button below to download your complimentary report.
<[[https://reprints.forrester.com/#/assets/2/1202/RES142215/reports]]>
You can come back to this email any time to download it again. Turbonomic delivers workload automation on-prem and across cloud environments by simultaneously optimizing performance cost and compliance in real-time.
Interested in learning more? Here's how our customers:
- Improve and assure application performance <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/]]>
- Lower costs on-prem and across clouds <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/projects/hybrid-cloud-management/]]>
- Accelerate cloud migration projects <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]>
- Deliver digital transformation <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-cio-guide-to-autonomic-it/]]>
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
